mapper.select:
SELECT b.ID,b.RSNAME,b.TWN,b.MDNM,b.MDAMTYPE,b.PRSC,b.RSFN,b.DSFLZ,b.TTCP,b.MD_MX_HIG,b.LGTD,b.LTTD,b.BSNM FROM reservoir_info b where delflag is null
and b.rsname like concat('%',#{rsname},'%')
and b.dscd like concat('',#{dscd},'%')
and b.dscd like concat('',#{dscd2},'%')
order by ID desc
